text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I go to the city on my day off to get a<n>look at something that
I think might<n>cheer Kawakami Princess up.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Haaaaah...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Suddenly an exasperated sigh grabs<n>my attention—it's her.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Wh-whoa! Trainer?! What are you<n>doing here?
choice_data_list: You seem pretty down today.
You seem pretty down today.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Well, yeah... of course I am! It's<n>horrible! The way that bully
behaved<n>was the worst!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
She was just like this character in<n>Princess Fighter... the
leader of the<n>Dark Umamusume, Dark Princess!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
I can't believe I lost to her... This isn't<n>just a bad ending,
it's downright<n>depressing! I've been demoted from<n>
princess to frog!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Kawakami Princess is more upset<n>about her loss than I
thought. The<n>place I came to check out should be<n>of help
though.
choice_data_list: Hey, there's somewhere I think we should go.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Hm? And where is that?
choice_data_list: Oh, I don't want to spoil it. You'll see.
Oh, I don't want to spoil it. You'll see.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: WHOOOA!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Trainer, this poster... It's for the very<n>first Princess Fighter
movie!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: But why... It came out years ago!
choice_data_list:
I found a theater that does showings of older
movies.

I found a theater that does showings of older
movies.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
So you mean... we can actually watch<n>Princess Fighter right
now? On the big<n>screen?
choice_data_list: We sure can!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Woohoooo! This is great!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
It's really the best, Trainer! What're<n>we waiting for? Let's
get our tickets!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: I think it's working!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Aaah... That was so moving!
choice_data_list: I'm glad you liked it.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: I loved it! The first movie willalways be the best one! It was soexciting I thought I was going to breakmy armrests off!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Ah, like that scene where the<n>princess is surrounded by a
billion<n>Dark Umamusume troops but<n>escapes orbit by
following the<n>prince's light signal!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Or the scene at the moon racetrack<n>where she and the
prince purify the<n>Dark Nebula Emperor after he fused<n>with
the black hole! I could watch it a<n>million times!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Wow, that was such fun... Really...

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
choice_data_list: What's wrong?
What's wrong?

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
A real princess and her prince have to<n>make incredible
things like that<n>happen, huh...

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
But when it came to it, I got wrecked<n>by Dark
Princess—well—someone just<n>like Dark Princess.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
I'm not fit to be a princess. The<n>furthest I'll ever get is
background<n>extra...
choice_data_list: But what about that other scene?
But what about that other scene?

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Huh? What other scene?
choice_data_list: The one right before the big climax.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Right before... Where the princess and<n>trainer are about to
enter the race<n>that'll decide the fate of the planet?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Exactly. Before the final battle, when<n>things are at their
darkest, the<n>princess and trainer have one last<n>talk...

text_block_list.name: Princess Fighter
text_block_list.text:
Could this truly be the end for us? Is<n>there no way to save
the planet?!

text_block_list.name: Legendary Trainer
text_block_list.text:
Wait, there's still a way... There's<n>one last race for us to
finish!

text_block_list.name: Legendary Trainer
text_block_list.text:
Wait, there's still a way... There's<n>one last race for us to
finish!

text_block_list.name: Legendary Trainer
text_block_list.text:
Listen to me, Princess. We already<n>know that no matter how
much we<n>struggle, we can't pull off a miracle<n>on our
own... unless!

text_block_list.name: Legendary Trainer
text_block_list.text:
Listen to me, Princess. We already<n>know that no matter how
much we<n>struggle, we can't pull off a miracle<n>on our
own... unless!

text_block_list.name: Princess Fighter
text_block_list.text:
We embrace our strengths and<n>weaknesses... And we
combine our<n>differences...

text_block_list.name: Legendary Trainer
text_block_list.text:
Then our power will far exceed our<n>normal capabilities.
That... that is what<n>makes a real miracle!

text_block_list.name: Legendary Trainer
text_block_list.text:
Then our power will far exceed our<n>normal capabilities.
That... that is what<n>makes a real miracle!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
("So let's go... to the race of our<n>destiny!" Oooh, the most
famous<n>scene in the movie!)

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
("So let's go... to the race of our<n>destiny!" Oooh, the most
famous<n>scene in the movie!)

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: (Whoa, wait one moment! What was<n>it I said before?)

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Aw, come on. You worry way too<n>much! I don't need any
tactics or<n>anything! Because...

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
We've got the invincible power of our<n>bond! Just trust it and
wait for my<n>return!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Aaaaagh!
choice_data_list: Are you okay?!
Are you okay?!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
I... I was totally taking it easy before! I<n>took things for
granted, like a miracle<n>would just happen on its own!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: I've seen the Princess Fighter moviedozens of times! But I forgot suchan important thing!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Argh! I'm so ashamed I could just<n>smash a hole in the
ground and hide in<n>it right this instant!
choice_data_list: Don't worry! Our fight is only beginning!
Don't worry! Our fight is only beginning!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Huh?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
It hasn't been long since we first met.<n>In Princess Fighter
terms... we're on<n>around episode six. We've barely<n>
gotten started.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Ah! You're right! That's exactly it! In<n>the beginning, Princess
Fighter<n>doesn't start out as a perfect<n>princess!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
She hates how training is going and<n>swims off to a desert
island... And<n>even crushes the dumbbells given to<n>her by
the crafter!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
But that's when she and the prince<n>talk it out and
understand each other...<n>They grow stronger over the
course of<n>forty-nine episodes!
choice_data_list: And that's exactly what we're going to do!
And that's exactly what we're going to do!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I'm just starting out too, so I'm far<n>from being Legendary
Trainer, but I'm<n>going to get there someday with<n>
Kawakami Princess!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, let's do it! We'll follow the way<n>of the princess
together!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: And I... I want to know more about<n>you—about my prince!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
I mean, there's so much I have no<n>idea about! Like, what
kind of clothes<n>you like, or your favorite ramen<n>toppings
and training equipment!
choice_data_list: You have to tell me all about yourself too.
You have to tell me all about yourself too.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
I definitely will! We'll talk about it<n>all—everything from our
childhoods to<n>what our parents are like!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Right... The power of a bond between<n>a princess and her
prince... That's<n>what'll truly power up my racing!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Ahhh, I feel like I'm about to explode<n>with energy!
Kawakami Princess... is...<n>baaack!
